name: Football Coin
description: $FOOTBALL is a Solana-based SPL token that brings global football fandom into digital asset markets. The project is supported by Troll Football, an online community with more than 4.8 million followers on X, giving it direct access to one of the largest sports fan bases in the world. $FOOTBALL is designed as a community and culture token, enabling football supporters to connect on-chain through engagement, identity, and potential fan-driven initiatives. By leveraging Solanaâ€™s high-speed, low-cost infrastructure, the token is easily transferable and accessible for everyday usage.
